summary: Admin/Karigar order management portal with role-based order status updates and enhanced admin dashboard UI styling.
architectural_notes: Role-based authorization: only Karigar portal can mark orders as Delivered; Admin/Staff should not have this permission.

existing_features.title: Update the Staff and Admin frontends so there is no UI action that allows marking orders as "delivered"; any existing Staff/Admin "Mark as Delivered" controls must be removed or disabled to reflect the authorization rule.
In Admin Dashboard → Delivered tab, add the same bulk action pattern available in Total Orders (selection + action button) to change selected delivered orders to status "given_to_hallmark".

Apply color styling on the Admin dashboard metric cards for “Orders in View”, “Customer Orders”, “Active Karigars”, and “Total Weight”, and add color styling to the tab indicator/slider bar for the main Admin dashboard tabs (from Total Orders to Karigars).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add action in Admin portal Delivered tab to change order status to 'Given for hallmark' (similar to Total Orders tab)
Add color styling to Admin dashboard tabs (Orders in View, Customer Orders, Active Karigars, Total Weight) and the slide bar/indicator across tabs from Total Orders to Karigars
Enforce that only the Karigar portal (users with app role #Karigar) can change an order’s status to "delivered"; prevent Admin and Staff users from marking orders as delivered via any backend method.
